snippets: “ This could open the door to some major escalation now, in the near future.”

Israel said it targeted a Hamas compound, but militants have denied the presence of installations in the camp. Journalists were reportedly not allowed to view the aftermath and verify the claims.
An Israeli airstrike on a Palestinian refugee camp in southern Lebanon on Tuesday killed 13 people and wounded several others, state media and government officials said.
The IDF said it targeted a Hamas training facility in southern Lebanon’s Ain al-Hilweh. The attack could put pressure on the tenuous ceasefire in Gaza.
It was one of the deadliest Israeli strikes on Lebanon since a cease-fire with Hezbollah went into effect about a year ago.

title: Nylander Ends Leafs' Skid, Bedard's Hat Trick Lifts Blackhawks in NHL Wins
snippets: Nylander sparks Maple Leafs past Blues in OT to end skid NHL.com

William Nylander stole the show in overtime, redeeming himself with an insane OT winner after scoring an own goal earlier in the game as the Toronto Maple Leafs snap their five-game skid with a win over the St. Louis Blues.

Connor Bedard recorded the second hat trick of his career, Oliver Moore picked up a goal and an assist, and Arvid Soderblom made 19 saves to lead the Chicago Blackhawks to a 5-2 win over the Calgary Flames.

Bo Horvat and Kyle Palmeri scored a pair of third-period goals, and Wyatt Johnston’s game-tying tally was wiped out with less than a second left as the New York Islanders held on for a wild win over the Dallas Stars 3-2.
Lucas Raymond recorded a goal and an assist and Alex DeBrincat added two helpers as the Detroit Red Wings defeated the Seattle Kraken 4-2.
Ben Hutton, Braeden Bowman, and Shea Theodore each scored and Tomas Hertl dished out two assists to help elevate the Vegas Golden Knights to a 3-2 win over the New York Rangers.
Macklin Celebrini scored all three goals for the San Jose Sharks for his third career hat trick, and Will Smith picked up two assists to lead the San Jose Sharks to a 3-2 win over the Utah Mammoth.
titles: Nylander sparks Maple Leafs past Blues in OT to end skid - NHL.com
NHL Highlights: Maple Leafs 3, Blues 2 (OT)
NHL Highlights: Blackhawks 5, Flames 2
NHL Highlights: Islanders 3, Stars 2

The Detroit Red Wings and Vegas Golden Knights also secured wins over the Seattle Kraken and New York Rangers, respectively.
